name: Pirate's Dice. Connect 4 in a row
name_original: Pirate's Dice. Connect 4 in a row
description:
Pirate's dice is an improved Lines 98 puzzle game in which you have random dice on a 7x7 board. Your goal is to connect 4 or more cubes of the same color in a row vertically, horizontally or diagonally. This puzzle was created for people who want to train their brain and relax at the same time. Try the new and challenging 4 in a row game offline.

THE GAME RULES:
- There is a 7x7 board with dice of five different colors
- You can move one die per turn to remove cubes by forming lines (horizontal, vertical or diagonal) of at least four dice of the same color.
- When a colored line is cleared, the dice in the line disappear and you gain one turn, i.e. you can move another die.
- If a line is not cleared, new cubes are added, and the game continues until the board is full.
- The number of cubes added will increase every level, but it can be decreased using a booster.
- The more dice you clear in one turn, the more scores you get.

BOOSTERS:
There are four types of boosters in the game and all of them can be collected in the game as well as from the opening pirate chests.
- Dynamite — removes 7 random dice on the board. The booster can be obtained by clearing 2 or more rows with a single turn.
- Bomb — removes any selected die from the board. The booster can be obtained by clearing a row of 7 dice.
- Helper — you can remove one die from the Next section using this buster (if Next section has 4, 5 or 6 cubes). The booster can be obtained by clearing dice 3 times in a row.
- Undo — if you made a mistake, you can fix it with Undo

BONUSES:
Open a pirate's chest to collect a random booster each time when it's available.

HINTS:
- Try to collect as much as possible Helper boosters. They will be useful on high levels
- Clearing multiple lines is a good strategy
- The more dice you clear in one turn, the more scores you get
- The dice can be moved through the empty fields only. Diagonal moves are not allowed.

PLAY OFFLINE:
No Wi-Fi? No problem! Play the game anytime without an internet connection.

STYLISH AND MINIMAL:
- Colorful theme and simple control provide an incredible user experience
- Calm & relaxing music will help you immerse yourself in the exciting atmosphere of the game
- A small puzzle game that can be downloaded by any device
- Supports all tablet devices!

We'd love to get your feedback about our puzzle game. To let us know about any problems & suggestions, feel free to send us an email at support@playrea.com.

Can you solve the puzzle? Place random dice in order and become a new pirate king!
